CHAT.comment: three-month old sibling of child present during activity session.
INV and mom move baby's car seat from front of computer box.
child opens eyes to see computer box.
mom and child get down on floor in front of computer box.
child's question cut off by baby crying.
child is picking up computer box cover.
child points to computer box.
computer box starts making noise.
child gets up and goes to lay down on couch.
child gets up and goes back on floor to computer box.
INV has entered the room.
INV covers up computer box.
INV rolls car into room.
mom is talking over child, child's utterances are hard to understand.
again, mom is talking over child.
child is pointing at edge of the car.
child is making a motion of crushing the car under his foot.
mom is talking to younger sibling.
child reaches front of the car.
child slowly rolls car to mom.
mom opens hood.
mom points to number on hood of car.
child is referring to next item.
child hands car to INV.
child covers his eyes.
INV takes car out of room.
INV hands meerkat to child.
child tries to hand it to younger sibling.
child is putting meerkat in his sibling's face.
child hits meerkat in the face, knocking it over.
child is trying to stand meerkat up in front of younger sibling.
child moves meerkat to different location to stand it up.
mom is interrupted by child knocking meerkat down again.
child hugs meerkat to chest and rolls around on ground.
mom appears to be talking to younger sibling here.
mom points to tail with foot.
child makes hitting noises and knocks meerkat over.
child lays on floor with meerkat.
child is hard to understand at end of utterance.
mom picks up meerkat, unclear whether she's talking to meerkat or for meerkat next.
child begins screeching/laughing.
mom bounces meerkat onto child's head.
mom and child switch places, with mom on couch and child standing up.
mom bounces meerkat around, both on child and his younger sibling.
child turns to his mom and makes noises.
mom points first to her own nose, then to child's nose.
child makes more noises.
child is speaking with his tongue hanging out of his mouth.
child is still speaking with his tongue out of his mouth, now is watching himself in the mirror.
more tongue-out-of-mouth sounds.
INV enters the room.
mom hands meerkat to child.
child hands meerkat to INV.
INV removes meerkat from room, child covers his eyes.
INV brings in degu, child uncovers eyes.
child is indicating outside of degu cage.
child is running around degu cage giggling.
child is talking to degu.
mom is pointing to top of degu's cage.
child is pointing to degu's bedding.
first part of child's utterance is a false start because mom was already talking.
mom is indicating sides of cage.
child indicates feet.
mom and child talk at the same time.
child is moving head over top of cage.
mom imitates degu sniffing in the air.
mom whispers something to younger sibling.
mom indicates the area for food on top of degu's cage.
mom indicates place for water bottle.
child drinks water.
child places his water bottle on top of degu cage.
child makes the motions of pouring some of his water into degu's cage.
child again puts water on top of cage.
INV removes degu and child covers his eyes.
INV brings robodog into room.
child uncovers eyes.
mom and child get up and move over to robodog.
child presses button on robodog.
child picks robodog up and then sets him down and backs off a bit.
child points to back button on robodog.
mom whispers something to younger sibling while child plays with robodog.
child might have said green and red?
child jumps up and runs over to chairs.
child is indicating underneath the chair.
robodog starts doing a trick.
child moves to pet robodog.
child jumps away from robodog.
child picks up robodog and moves it back to middle of the room.
child pushes on tushie.
INV enters room.
child covers eyes and INV removes robodog.
cover comes off starfish tank.
child points to side of tank opposite the starfish.
child and mom are discussing chairs, child takes mom's blue chair in front of tank.
mom had started to move in front of camera.
mom is talking to younger sibling, puts him up by tank.
sibling starts crying loudly.
baby's crying obscures part of phrases.
child points at two different spots in tank.
INV enters room.
starfish tank is covered.
